scripts.build: yarn check-ts && yarn generate-examples && yarn package-code && yarn check-links && docusaurus build
scripts.check-ts: yarn check-ts:core_features && yarn check-ts:dapp_examples && yarn check-ts:vitejs && yarn check-ts:workshop
scripts.check-ts:core_features: cd code_examples/core_features && yarn install && yarn check-ts
scripts.check-ts:dapp_examples: cd code_examples/dapp && yarn install && yarn check-ts
scripts.check-ts:vitejs: cd code_examples/vitejs && yarn install && yarn check-ts
scripts.check-ts:workshop: cd code_examples/workshop && yarn install && yarn check-ts
scripts.install: yarn install:core_features && yarn install:dapp && yarn install:scripts && yarn install:vitejs && yarn install:staking && yarn install:workshop
scripts.fix: yarn fix:core_features && yarn fix:dapp_examples && yarn fix:scripts && yarn fix:staking && yarn fix:vitejs && yarn fix:workshop
scripts.generate-examples: cd scripts && yarn install && yarn generate
